'''Lapis''' may refer to:
== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Lapis Lazuli}} – a mineral which can be used for [[enchanting]]
* {{BlockLink|Block of Lapis Lazuli}} – a decorative mineral [[block]] crafted from lapis lazuli
* {{BlockLink|Lapis Lazuli Ore}} – an [[ore]] block from which lapis lazuli is obtained
* {{BlockLink|Deepslate Lapis Lazuli Ore}} - a [[deepslate]] variant of lapis lazuli ore

=== April Fools' jokes ===
* {{BlockLink|Potone Lapis Lazuli Ore}}, a variant of lapis lazuli ore appearing in [[24w14potato]].

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
* {{LeMiscLink|Lapis}}, a resource used to spawn units and build spawners
* {{LeStructureLink|Lapis Flag}}, a structure that can be built in [[MCL:Versus Mode|Versus Mode]] to passively collect lapis
